ygData.subject: Re: AzureBlade, Mistra, and Kali! (Location: North Amercia)
ygData.msgSnippet: AzureBlade looked at the supposed predacon. He knew they wanted Mistra... A new rookie was too much power to let your enemy have it without a fight.

Subject: Re: AzureBlade, Mistra, and Kali! (Location: North Amercia)

AzureBlade looked at the supposed predacon. He knew they wanted 
Mistra... A new rookie was too much power to let your enemy have it 
without a fight.

AzureBlade: And who might you be, lady? You know it is unsafe to 
travel alone in this forest. There are many wolves, and legends even 
speak of a dreadful dragon. You should be more careful.

Seeing Mistra move next to him warmed his heart. It seemed as though 
she had made her choice.

He made a quick evaluation of the situation. The first advantage they 
had over the Pred was number and sheer size. Even in robot mode, 
AzureBlade was taller and larger than her. For now, he was in dragon 
mode, which made him slightly bigger. It would be easy to pin her 
down. However, they were in a cave, and that restrained him for the 
same reasons. He could not maneuver easily, unless he broke through 
the Pred and went for the exit. For now though, he wanted to keep 
things as cool as possible. He decided to stick with diplomacy.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., HanaKirei85@a... wrote:
> <<AzureBlade was overjoyed to hear her words. He wanted to yell his 
> happiness, but he refrained and simply smiled. He smiled widely, but 
> he only smiled.
> 
> AzureBlade: I respect your choice and I appreciate it. It is ironic 
> though! I had just told them I wanted to be left alone for some 
times, 
> and I am about to come back with a new rookie! Do you think you'll 
be 
> able to fly though? It is a long way...>>
> 
> "I think I'll be able to manage." Mistra said, still smiling 
slightly. Her 
> only prominent problem right now was her activation code...although 
she 
> should be able to manage it somehow. It shouldn't be too hard...
> 
> <<Kali::
> 
> Kali arrived where Azure blade and Mistra were "So, you arrived 
> first"said the femme while she trasformed to her pretty robot mode 
"I 
> guess that you're a maximal, aren't you???">>
> 
> Mistra's eyes widened at the new arrival...and dragon bot? Only a 
female 
> bot.. Her ears flew back, only hoping this bot would be as kind as 
Azure had 
> been up till now. Even if it seemed doubtful...there was a war going 
on right 
> now. If this bot attacked, what would Mistra be able to do? She'd 
have to go 
> offline for a brief period to change her activation code from 
whatever it 
> was...she knew that much. Hopefully there wouldn't be a battle...not 
now.
> 
> <<AzureBlade turned quickly to face...
> Another dragon bot. The ones he knew were either maximal or 
Predacon, 
> and since the maximal ones were unheard of since the last battle...
> 
> AzureBlade: What of it? What if I really am?
> 
> He stood on his guards, but did not appear threatening... for 
now...>>
> 
> Relieved by the reminder that Azure was in fact still there, Mistra 
felt a 
> bit better about it...although she wouldn't sit to a side if a 
battle did 
> occur. She moved slowly, always facing Kali, until she was beside 
Azure. She 
> felt safer there anyway...and her status pod didn't matter now.
